Title:
Taxonomy of Coniochaeta leucoplaca and C. velutina:
morphological and molecular studies based on LSU rDNA of isolates from
Taiwan.
Abstract:
The taxonomy of Coniochaeta leucoplaca and C. velutina was
an uncertain subject in previous researches. We examined type materials
and fresh Taiwanese collections, and found distinct morphological
characters of the perithecia, ascospores, cultures, etc. Sequence
analysis of the large subunit ribosomal DNA supports this disposition.
Relationships between phylogeny and habitat association within
Coniochaeta are discussed. The detailed descriptions of and a key to C.
leucoplaca and C. velutina are provided. These are new records for
Taiwan.
